newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: PUBHOLD , PUBLICO STILL IN TALKS.
newsitem.headline: PUBHOLD , PUBLICO STILL IN TALKS.

text.p: Printing and publishing firm Publico Ltd and its holding company Publico Holdings Ltd said on Monday that they were still in talks which, if successfully concluded, could have an impact on their share prices.
Shareholders were advised to exercise caution in their share dealings until further notice.
